title: Want to Upgrade my T206 Mordecai Brown
author: wazoo

posts.post_title: Want to Upgrade my T206 Mordecai Brown
posts.post_content: Hey everyone, I hope all is well. I've had this Mordecai Brown in my collection for a few years now, so the time has come where I am ready to upgrade it. It's a beautiful card, aside from that punch hole. Regardless of the hole, it doesn't take away from the beauty of the card. I would love to upgrade it to a SGC or PSA 3-4. I would also consider the portrait and Cubs version as well. Thanks and some responses would be greatly appreciated. Thanks once again.
Somebody's gotta have one. Also, if you don't have upgrades, please send me a tradelist.

Here's the nicest PSA 4 you're bound to find. Let me know if you're interested. 
Tim  (timothy_browne@hotmail.com)

[quote name="tjb1952tjb" post=1106047]Here's the nicest PSA 4 you're bound to find. Let me know if you're interested. 
Tim  (timothy_browne@hotmail.com)[/QUOTE]

Since I haven't heard from you I assume you're not interested. I just wanted to give you first shot before it goes elsewhere. Good luck.

interesting..... i didnt realize that a card with a hole punch would get a grade, thought it would only get an A.  I have 3 cards (T205's) with punches (got then for their backs, pied 42's)they are real nice excetp for the hole punch.... Learn something every day.

[quote name="EvilKing00" post=1107028]interesting..... i didnt realize that a card with a hole punch would get a grade, thought it would only get an A.[/QUOTE]

Not to hijack the thread, but sometimes hole-punched cards do get a grade like my Hickman below:

[IMG]http://www.t206blog.com/wp-content/uploads/2012/09/t206-Hickman-Hindu-Southern-League-SGC-10.jpg[/IMG]
Very sorry for not responding. What is your asking price?

good god...someone upgrade this guy lol. this has been an on going thread now for like weeks lol.

kevin

OMG LOL LOL LOL. 

THANKS FOR THE WONDERFUL INPUT KEVIN!

Bump. Sorry for any delayed responses.

Waz, you've been M.I.A.  I had a Brown (mid March) and a Chase trophy (early April) that I tried to give you first crack at via PM and ended up selling both on BST...I hope you aren't having a problem receiving PMs.
